channel.title: How the hell do I add safe zones?
channel.description: You see in my 525 server, most of the locations are Pvp zones, and I want to add more safe zones just so there can be a norma l "train" and such. If you know how to work with this, feel free to leave your comment. :) Get's harder by the seccond.

item.title: How the hell do I add safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @Ambriosa1 Ambriosa1
item.description:
@Ambriosa1 wrote:

I did Not double post or so, I was asking questions do to continous answers.
After I finished one problem, I had another one, after I solved that one, I had another question.
So that wasn’t Double posting bud.
It’s common sense.

Read full topic
item.source: How the hell do I add safe zones?

item.title: How the hell do I add safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I locked your other topics, as multiple topics are not allowed. Next time, just put everything you need help with into a single thread.

I is not giving up hope. ;D

item.title: How the hell do I add safe zones?

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Well i know for a 317 its public boolean nonwild. Try something along those lines, its prolly alot diferent since palidino76 wrote 525’s and 508’s i believe, and in my opinion fucked them up.
